    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackMenuButton, BackStopDefiningProtocolButton, CancelCompareButton, CancelSaveResultsButton, CloseCompareButton, CloseLoadButton, CloseResultsButton, CloseSaveButton, CloseSingleGraphViewButton, CompareButton, ComparePerformanceButton, DistributionsButton, ExportDistributionButton, ExportMultipleGraphsButton, ExportSingleGraphButton, LoadInitDistButton, LoadProtocolButton, LoadResultsButton, MenuToggleButton, MixNowButton, NewCompareButton, OverwriteSaveButton, ProtocolsButton, RemoveInitDistButton, RemoveSavedProtButton, RemoveSavedResultsButton, ResetDistButton, ResetProtocolButton, ResultsButton, SaveDistributionButton, SaveItemPanelButton, SaveProtocolButton, SaveResultsButton, ToggleColourButton, ToggleDefineProtocol, ToolSelectButton, ViewSingleGraphButton

    public class FastButton
extends FastPressElement

    A FastButton is an element that can be used like a Button, but on touch devices it will respond immediately to touches instead of with a delay. This type of button should be used anywhere instead of "regular" buttons to ensure a "snappy" experience and fix weird bugs.

    Note: this class basically wraps a Button element that can be accessed trough the getButton() method.

    Author:
    Group Fingerpaint

      • onHoldPressDownStyle

        public void onHoldPressDownStyle()
        Description copied from class: FastPressElement
        Implement the handler for pressing but NOT releasing the button. Normally you just want to show some CSS style change to alert the user the element is active but not yet pressed ONLY FOR STYLE CHANGE - Will briefly be called onClick TIP: Don't make a dramatic style change. Take note that if a user is just trying to scroll, and start on the element and then scrolls off, we may not want to distract them too much. If a user does scroll off the element,
        Specified by:
        onHoldPressDownStyle in class FastPressElement

      • onHoldPressOffStyle

        public void onHoldPressOffStyle()
        Description copied from class: FastPressElement
        Implement the handler for release of press. This should just be some CSS or Style change. ONLY FOR STYLE CHANGE - Will briefly be called onClick TIP: This should just go back to the normal style.
        Specified by:
        onHoldPressOffStyle in class FastPressElement
